item.title: 克雷斯特-尼科尔森（Crest Nicholson）因销售额停滞不前，指导意见疲软，股价暴跌
item.description: 克雷斯特-尼科尔森控股公司（Crest Nicholson Holdings Plc）股价创下 16 个月来最大跌幅，此前这家英国房屋建筑商警告称，税前利润将低于指导值，原因是预算案出台前的不确定性导致购房者仍持观望态度。【原文：Crest Nicholson Holdings Plc shares plummeted the most in 16 months after the UK housebuilder warned pretax profit will be at the lower end of its guidance, as home buyers remained on the sidelines amid uncertainty before the budget.】

item.title: 受人工智能和加密货币担忧影响，标普 500 指数创 8 月以来最长跌势
item.description: 由于对美联储政策前景、人工智能估值和比特币抛售的担忧，标准普尔500指数将连续第四个交易日下滑。【原文：The S&P 500 was set to slide for a fourth straight session on concerns around the Federal Reserve’s policy outlook, artificial intelligence valuations and a selloff in Bitcoin.】

item.title: 欧盟银行家准备让资本缓冲改革失望
item.description: 未来几周，当欧盟官员提出削减繁文缛节的建议时，欧盟的银行业高管们可能会感到失望，因为他们预计这些措施将远远落后于美国放松管制的步伐。【原文：Banking executives in the European Union are bracing to be disappointed when officials lay out proposals to cut red tape in the coming weeks, as they predict that the measures will be far behind the deregulation taking place in the US.】

item.title: 哈利法塔开发商在全球房地产开发中将目光投向意大利
item.description: 在迪拜开发了世界最高塔楼的建筑商将目光投向了意大利，与迪拜的其他建筑商一起进行全球投资。【原文：The man who developed the world’s tallest tower in Dubai has set his sights on Italy, joining a string of other builders from the city in making global investments.】

item.title: 高市会议后，上田发出日本央行仍将加息的信号
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫向首相佐佐江孝一表示，日本央行正在逐步调整货币宽松程度，这表明他谨慎加息的意图毫不动摇。【原文：Governor Kazuo Ueda told Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi that the Bank of Japan is in the process of gradually adjusting its degree of monetary easing, signaling his unshaken intention to carefully raise rates.】

item.title: 英国监管机构就在线定价问题调查 StubHub 和 Viagogo
item.description: 英国反垄断监督机构对包括在线票务供应商 StubHub 和 Viagogo 在内的八家企业展开了一系列调查，这是根据旨在保护在线购物者的更严格规则提起的首批案件。【原文：The UK’s antitrust watchdog opened a series of investigations into eight businesses including online ticket vendors StubHub and Viagogo in what is the first set of cases brought under tougher rules intended to protect online shoppers.】

item.title: 亚马逊支持的 More Retail 选择银行进行 3 亿美元的印度 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亚马逊公司和 Samara Capital Partners 共同拥有的食品和杂货连锁店 More Retail Pvt.【原文：More Retail Pvt., the food and grocery chain jointly owned by Amazon.com Inc. and Samara Capital Partners, has picked advisers for an impending initial public offering that could raise about $300 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: ABB 提高利润率目标，希望通过收购实现增长
item.description: 由于人工智能应用的蓬勃发展促进了对其电网产品的需求，这家瑞士工业制造商受益于此，ABB 有限公司上调了其运营利润率目标。【原文：ABB Ltd. raised its operating profitability target as the Swiss industrial manufacturer benefits from a boom in artificial intelligence applications that’s bolstering demand for its power-grid products.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数将在全球大跌中连续第四天下跌
市场悲观情绪蔓延，加密货币暴跌扰乱神经
item.description: 周二亚洲交易时段，比特币跌破9万美元，加剧了整个市场的抛售，投资者纷纷抛售股票，寻求政府债券的安全保障。【原文：Bitcoin’s slide below $90,000 worsened a selloff across markets during Asian trading hours on Tuesday, as investors dumped stocks and sought safety in government bonds.】

item.title: 多乐士涂料所有者阿克苏诺贝尔同意与 Axalta 合并
item.description: 阿克苏诺贝尔公司（Akzo Nobel NV）已同意收购规模较小的竞争对手涂料生产商阿克苏塔涂料系统有限公司（Axalta Coating Systems Ltd.），这项跨国交易将创建一家企业价值约 250 亿美元的涂料公司。【原文：Akzo Nobel NV has agreed to acquire smaller rival paint maker Axalta Coating Systems Ltd. in a cross-border deal creating a coatings company with an enterprise value of about $25 billion.】

item.title: 彭博社正在寻找非洲杰出的初创企业
item.description:
我们想了解那些正在设计非洲未来的公司。【原文：

We want to know about the companies that are designing Africa’s future.

】

item.title: 西班牙预算僵局使政府支出动力受限
item.description: 西班牙的政治家们确实无法就预算达成一致，而这对公共财政来说却恰到好处。【原文：Spain’s politicians really can’t agree on a budget, and that’s working out just fine for the public finances.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯巨型城市公园规划者启动 10 亿美元基金
item.description: 沙特国家支持的一家开发商正在建设世界上最大的城市公园之一，该开发商启动了一项价值 10 亿美元的投资基金，以推动开发并吸引私人投资者。【原文：A Saudi state-backed developer building one of the world’s largest city parks started a $1 billion investment fund to drive development and attract private investors.】

item.title: 菲律宾大亨损失 160 亿美元，地产财富三天内枯竭
item.description: 最近几天，菲律宾最狂热的股票之一出现暴跌，其创始人 160 多亿美元的身家化为乌有，并引发了有关其非凡崛起和突然暴跌的新问题。【原文：One of the frothiest stocks in the Philippines has plunged in recent days, erasing more than $16 billion of its founder’s fortune and raising new questions about its remarkable ascent and sudden nosedive.】

item.title: 金管局与沙特主权财富基金合作推出 10 亿美元基金
item.description: 香港金融管理局和沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金正在启动一项 10 亿美元的基金，以帮助香港和大湾区的公司进军中东国家。【原文：The Hong Kong Monetary Authority and Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund are starting a $1 billion fund to help Hong Kong and Greater Bay Area companies expand into the Middle Eastern country.】

item.title: 对高市财政一揽子计划的担忧加深日本债券走势
item.description: 周二，日本较长期限的主权债券进一步下跌，因为投资者更加担心首相佐那江隆一提出的大型经济方案会损害日本的公共财政。【原文：Japan’s longer-maturity sovereign bonds tumbled further Tuesday as investor worries deepened that a big economic package from Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi would damage the nation’s public finances.】

item.title: 日本执政党集团推动大幅增加额外预算
item.description: 日本执政党自民党的一群议员敦促首相高市真奈在为其经济方案做最后的润色时，制定一份远大于迄今为止所显示的规模的额外预算。【原文：A group of lawmakers in Japan’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party urged Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi to craft an extra budget much larger than what’s been indicated thus far as she puts the finishing touches on her economic package.】

item.title: Nvidia支持的Cassava公司推动人工智能在非洲的普及
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）支持的木薯技术公司（Cassava Technologies）计划筹集多达 7 亿美元的资金，用于在非洲各地建设和升级配备人工智能芯片的数据中心网络，目的是让公司和非营利组织以及世界上一些最贫穷的人更能负担得起人工智能服务。【原文：Nvidia Corp.-backed Cassava Technologies plans to raise as much as $700 million to build and upgrade a network of data centers across Africa with artificial intelligence chips, with the goal of making AI services more affordable for companies and nonprofits, as well as some of the world’s poorest people.】

item.title: 不需要埋头苦干就能知道泡沫往哪边吹
item.description:
英伟达的财报就像一个宏观事件。它们只是值得关注的一件事。【原文：

Nvidia’s earnings land like a macro event. They’re just one thing to watch.

】

item.title: 中国稀土产品出口受挫，与美国的谈判仍在继续
item.description: 中国 10 月份稀土产品出口量环比下降，原因是北京和华盛顿仍在商讨贸易休战协议下的供应安排细节。【原文：China’s exports of rare-earth products edged lower in October from a month earlier, as Beijing and Washington continue to hash out details of supply arrangements under their trade truce.】

item.title: 匈牙利将维持关键利率不变，关注通胀问题
item.description: 匈牙利准备连续第 14 个月维持欧盟最高关键利率不变，因为政策制定者们正集中精力支持福林，以帮助抑制高于目标的通货膨胀。【原文：Hungary is poised to hold the European Union’s highest key interest rate unchanged for a 14th month as policymakers focus on supporting the forint to help rein in above-target inflation.】

item.title: 日本股市因科技股下滑、财政忧虑和中国问题而扩大跌幅
item.description: 日本股市跌幅扩大，日经 225 指数下跌超过 3%，原因是人们担心科技股估值过高、债券收益率上升以及东京和北京之间的外交争执，从而削弱了风险偏好。【原文：Japanese stocks extended their decline with the Nikkei 225 Stock Average dropping more than 3%, as concerns about lofty tech valuations, rising bond yields and a diplomatic spat between Tokyo and Beijing sapped risk appetite.】

item.title: 比特币 ETF 投资者在 89,600 美元关口被突破后目前处于亏损状态
item.description: 比特币的涨势通过易于获取的 ETF 迎来了一波新投资者，但这波涨势已正式跌入谷底。【原文：The Bitcoin rally that welcomed a wave of new investors through easy-to-access ETFs has officially gone underwater.】

item.title: KKR 目标于 12 月完成第二支亚洲私人信贷基金的募集工作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.计划在 12 月完成其第二支专注于亚洲的信贷基金，目标规模约为 20 亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co. is aiming to close its second Asia-focused credit fund in December and is targeting around $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易短暂停滞后中国加紧购买美国大豆
item.description: 中国购买了近一百万吨美国大豆，打破了明显的停顿状态，这是一个新的信号，表明中国政府仍然致力于与华盛顿的贸易休战。【原文：China bought nearly a million tons of US soybeans, breaking an apparent pause, in a fresh signal that Beijing remains committed to its trade truce with Washington.】

item.title: 苹果公司 iPhone 在中国销量激增，占据 25% 的市场份额
item.description: 苹果公司的 iPhone 17 系列推动其在中国的智能手机月销量增长了 37%，标志着这一重要市场的强劲势头。【原文：Apple Inc.’s iPhone 17 series drove a 37% rise in its monthly smartphone sales in China, signaling strong momentum in a key market.】

item.title: 100 万南非兰特投资去向
item.description:
五位理财专家分享了他们对当前资金投向的看法。【原文：

Five financial experts share their views on where to put your money right now.

】

item.title: 韩国家庭债务居高不下，令韩国央行在会议前保持警惕
item.description: 韩国家庭债务水平增长放缓，但由于抵押贷款稳定而保持高位，这些数据支持韩国央行在下周举行的当局会议上避免重启货币宽松周期。【原文：Growth in South Korea’s household debt levels slowed while staying elevated on the back of steady mortgage lending, in data backing the case for the Bank of Korea to refrain from resuming the monetary easing cycle when authorities meet next week.】

item.title: 大西洋液化天然气运价飙升至 2024 年初以来最高点
item.description: 由于北美出口的扩大刺激了对油轮的需求，横跨大西洋运输液化天然气的成本飙升至近两年来的最高点。【原文：The cost of transporting liquefied natural gas across the Atlantic Ocean surged to the highest in almost two years, as expanding exports from North America boosted demand for tankers.】
